description: Forward geocode a place into latitude & longitude.

input.name: mapboxApiKey
input.description: A Mapbox API key from https://www.mapbox.com/.

input.name: data
input.description: An object containing columns and rows.

input.name: placeColumn
input.description: The source column with the place query.

input.name: longitudeColumn
input.description: The target column for the longitude result. Defaults to "longitude".

input.name: latitudeColumn
input.description: The target column for the latitude result. Defaults to "latitude".

input.name: typeColumn
input.description: The name of the column to hold the place type. Defaults to "type".

output.name: data
output.description: An object containing columns and rows.
